_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY DARKMATTER SERVERS - ANTIMATTERZONE.NET
name: DMS FiveM Server
author: captainpax@antimatterzone.net
description: Standalone FiveM FXServer setup (auto-installs latest artifacts) with full variable-driven startup. Built by Darkmatter Servers (AntimatterZone).
startup: ./alpine/opt/cfx-server/FXServer +exec server.cfg +set sv_licenseKey {{FIVEM_LICENSE}} +set steam_webApiKey {{STEAM_WEBAPIKEY}} +set onesync {{ONESYNC_STATE}} +set sv_enforceGameBuild {{GAME_BUILD}} +sets sv_projectName "{{PROJECT_NAME}}" +sets sv_projectDesc "{{PROJECT_DESCRIPTION}}" +set txAdminPort {{TXADMIN_PORT}} +set txAdminEnabled {{TXADMIN_ENABLE}} +set sv_endpoint_add_tcp "0.0.0.0:{{FIVEM_PORT}}" +set sv_endpoint_add_udp "0.0.0.0:{{FIVEM_PORT}}"

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
echo "[*] Installation handled inside Docker image. No install needed here."

variables.name: FiveM License Key
variables.description: Your official FiveM server license key from https://keymaster.fivem.net/

variables.name: Steam Web API Key
variables.description: Steam Web API key used for player authentication.

variables.name: OneSync State
variables.description: Enable OneSync (on, off, or legacy). Allows >32 players when on.

variables.name: Game Build
variables.description: Force the server to use a specific GTA V game build. Leave blank for default.

variables.name: Project Name
variables.description: Displayed server project name shown to players.

variables.name: Project Description
variables.description: Displayed project description in server list.

variables.name: Enable txAdmin
variables.description: Enable the txAdmin web panel (1 to enable, 0 to disable).

variables.name: txAdmin Port
variables.description: Port for the txAdmin web panel (default 40120).

variables.name: FiveM Game Port
variables.description: Primary FiveM server port (TCP and UDP). Default 30120.
